thread.title: BRIEF-Hamilton Beach, Bartesian Enter Into Exclusive Multi-Year Agreement

title: BRIEF-Hamilton Beach, Bartesian Enter Into Exclusive Multi-Year Agreement

organizations.name: reuters) - hamilton beach brands holding co

text: March 6, 2018 / 2:13 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Hamilton Beach, Bartesian Enter Into Exclusive Multi-Year Agreement Reuters Staff March 6 (Reuters) - Hamilton Beach Brands Holding Co : * HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS, INC. AND BARTESIAN ENTER INTO AN EXCLUSIVE MULTI-YEAR AGREEMENT * HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS - MULTI-YEAR DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH BARTESIAN TO SELL, MARKET AND DISTRIBUTE BARTESIAN-BRANDED PRODUCTS​ * HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS - TO BEGIN DISTRIBUTION OF BARTESIAN PRODUCTS IN Q4 2018, WILL SELL THROUGHOUT U.S. & CANADA AT SELECT RETAILERS​ Source text for Eikon:
